CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar City Core relative to Sector Beta?
SRP.A: Stellar City Core is {above} Sector Beta in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Enclave}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Quarter}.

VE.Q: What is Verdant Ward's Life Expectancy in 1962?
VE.A: Verdant Ward's life expectancy in 1962 is {80.31} years.

VE.Q: What is Sector Beta's Life Expectancy in 1963?
VE.A: Sector Beta's life expectancy in 1963 is {71.83} years.

VE.Q: What is Sector Beta's Life Expectancy in 1967?
VE.A: Sector Beta's life expectancy in 1967 is {47.24} years.

VE.Q: What are the life expectancy of Crimson Quarter, Stellar City Core, and Sector Beta in 1971?
VE.A: Crimson Quarter's life expectancy is {30.86} years, Stellar City Core's life expectancy is {58.43} years, Sector Beta's life expectancy is {30.97} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Life Expectancy in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum life expectancy is {22.40} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Life Expectancy in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum life expectancy is {127.91} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Life Expectancy level recorded for Azure Enclave?
EVJ.A: Azure Enclave reached approximately {127.91} years in {1974}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Life Expectancy level recorded for Azure Enclave?
EVJ.A: Azure Enclave's lowest recorded level is approximately {79.81} years in {1962}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Life Expectancy?
SC.A: The average total life expectancy is {389.79} years.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Life Expectancy go below 348.93 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Life Expectancy exceed 401.35 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Life Expectancy fall between 356.39 and 393.90 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1971, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1964 and 1968?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 1966 and 1971 was {lower} than between 1964 and 1968.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1973, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1968 and 1974?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 1966 and 1973 was {higher} than between 1968 and 1974.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 1972 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in 1972 was {lower} than in 1973.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 1966 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in 1966 was {higher} than in 1969.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Azure Enclave} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sector Beta, Crimson Quarter, Verdant Ward, Stellar City Core, Outer Rim Settlements, Azure Enclave}.
